scripts.build: rollup -c;  terser --compress --mangle -o build/garden.min.js -- build/garden.js; find build -maxdepth 1 -not -type d -exec du -h {} \;
scripts.develop: rollup -w -c;  terser --compress --mangle -o build/garden.min.js -- build/garden.js; find build -maxdepth 1 -not -type d -exec du -h {} \;
